text: Sebastian Ofner was the defending champion but lost in the third round to Aleksandar Vukic. Evgeny Donskoy won the title after defeating Sebastian Korda 7–6(7–5), 3–6, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw President's Cup (tennis) - Men's Singles 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 President's Cup (tennis) – Men's Singles
